sorular.soru: What is the minimum tread depth required for the main grooves of a tyre?

feedback.metin: The main grooves of a tyre must be at least 1.6 mm. More is safer. A winter tyre must have a minimum tread depth of 4 mm to work properly.

sorular.soru: What is the maximum allowed speed of a moped as determined by its construction?

feedback.metin: A moped has a maximum construction speed of 45 km/h. This means that it is technically unsafe to ride a moped faster.

sorular.soru: Above what exceeding of the speed limit in this situation, do you receive a Light Educational Measure Behaviour and Traffic (LEMG)?

feedback.metin: You will be required to follow the Light Educational Measure in Behaviour and Traffic (EMG), if you exceed the speed limit by more than 50 km/h or by more than 30 km/h in case of roadworks. In this situation there are roadworks. You must pay for this course yourself. If you do not take this course, your driving licence will be invalidated.

sorular.soru: What is the maximum allowed speed here if you are towing a trailer?

feedback.metin: Cars with a trailer have a speed limit of 50 km/h within built-up areas. On autowegen outside built-up areas and motorways, the maximum allowed speed is 90 km/h.
